name: Flock Off (Cptn_Turtle)
description:
You are Bord the bird.  You must collect twigs to build your nest before the rest of the flock arrives and picks the place clean.

Note:

This was the first game I ever started and I've decided to "finish" it out of spite.  It may mildly amuse you for a minute.

Sound from opengameart.org:

Plingy Coin by Fupi

Happy Adventure (Loop) by TinyWorlds

Punch, Slap, N' Kick sounds by CGEffex
